description: A special paper that points toward its creator, allowing people to find each other no matter the distance. The paper also reflects the life force of its creator - shrinking when they are weak or injured, and returning to normal size when they recover.

keyMoments.title: Rayleigh Provides Vivre Cards to the Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: Rayleigh gives each Straw Hat crew member a Vivre Card so they can reunite after the three-day coating period.
keyMoments.significance: These Vivre Cards become crucial for the crew's eventual reunion after their separation at Sabaody.

abilities: Points toward its creator regardless of distance
Reflects the life force of its creator
Cannot be destroyed by normal means
origin: Created in the New World using a piece of the creator's fingernail
strategicValue: Essential navigation tool for reuniting separated individuals
culturalSignificance: Widely used by pirates in the New World for crew coordination
